text:
@DWUhlfelderLaw Ohhh, let me run this quick math. 
1) Florida has 21.5 million people
2) @marcorubio is apparently alright with 5% of them taking the #COVIDhit 

That means 1,075,000 Floridians have been offered up to win the prize of no return. Now ain’t that something. #COVID19 #PettyMath
